title: Nokkrir geisladiskar til sölu
text:
Geisladiskar til sölu – er aðeins með eitt eintak af hverjum disk – fyrstur kemur fyrstur fær.
Mugison – Is this monkey music? – 500 kr.
http://mugison.grapewire.net/is/album/198
Your Song – Páll Rósinkranz – 500 kr.
http://www.tonlist.is/Music/ViewAlbum.aspx?AlbumID=4689
Handel – Water Music – Essential Classics 500 kr.
http://www.sonyclassical.com/music/48285/main.html
I believe in you – Páll Rósinkranz – 500 kr.
http://www.tonlist.is/Music/Album/2244/pall_rosinkranz/i_believe_in_you/
Aretha in Paris – 500 kr.
http://www.amazon.com/Aretha-Paris-Franklin/dp/B0000033FZ
System of a Down (WARNING: This recording contains explicit language) – 500 kr.
http://www.amazon.com/System-Down/dp/B000007T1M/ref=sr_1_4?ie=UTF8&s=music&qid=1206743735&sr=1-4
Dances with Wolves – 500 kr.
http://www.amazon.com/Dances-Wolves-Original-Picture-Soundtrack/dp/B0000027G6/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&s=music&qid=1206743833&sr=1-2
Off the Deep End – „Weird Al“ Yankovic – 500 kr.
http://www.amazon.com/Off-Deep-End-Weird-Yankovic/dp/B00000I01H/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=music&qid=1206743864&sr=1-1
The very Best of Era – 500 kr.
http://www.amazon.com/Very-Best-Era/dp/B0007RDRF6/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=music&qid=1206743885&sr=1-1
Þursabit – Hinn íslenski Þursaflokkur 500 kr.
http://www.tonlist.is/Music/Album/6478/thursaflokkurinn/thursabit/
Ísland – Spilverk Þjóðanna – 500 kr.
http://www.tonlist.is/Music/Album/1904/spilverk_thjodanna/island/
Gleðileg Jól – Jólalaga diskur í boði Osta og smjörsölunar, reyndar merkilega gott samansafn.
Þessi fylgir frítt með einhverjum öðrum disk eða diskum.
Allir diskarnir saman í pakka á 4.000 kr. sem er 1.500 kr afsláttur.
Hafðu samband í síma 842-5412 eða sendu email á loftura@gmail.com
